nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transactions

Interface TransferAuthorizationServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service, TransferAuthorizationService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransferAuthorizationServiceImpl

    public interface TransferAuthorizationServiceLocal
extends TransferAuthorizationService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transfer authorize(TransferAuthorizationDTO transferAuthorizationDto, boolean newTransaction)
      Same as TransferAuthorizationService.authorize(TransferAuthorizationDTO), but allowing to determine whether a new transaction is used
      Transfer authorizeOnInsert(LockHandler lockHandler, Transfer transfer)
      Automatically called when a transfer is inserted to authorize instantly when the one making a payment as member is the one that authorizes
      boolean canAuthorizeOrDeny(Transfer transfer)
      Returns whether the logged user can authorize or deny the given transfer
      boolean canCancel(Transfer transfer)
      Returns whether the logged user can cancel the given transfer that was submitted to authorization
      java.util.Collection<TransferAuthorization> load(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> ids, Relationship... fetch)
      Loads a collection of transfer authorization fetching the relationships for each one.
      TransferAuthorization load(java.lang.Long id, Relationship... fetch)
      Loads a transfer authorization fetching the relationships

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transactions.TransferAuthorizationService

        authorize, cancel, deny, hasAlreadyAuthorized, searchAuthorizations, searchTransfersAwaitingAuthorization
